title: Condensed typeface?
content:
Hello,

Would anyone have any idea as to what typeface the main text (not the large print) in this scanned image might be?

It appears to be condensed but I’m not sure.

Thanks for any help you may be able to offer.

Fred.

 [‹ 3 typeface questions - one inky script, one 1960's sans, one small caps?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003935/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45227 "Go to previous forum topic") [looking for school script font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907003935/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45221 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredgassit
